name: French conjugation - offline
description: Conjugation list of most French verbs. French Conjugation offline 12000 Verbs  the French Conjugation application allows you to conjugate all French verbs easily without an Internet connection. French Conjugation 12000 Verbs French conjugation allows you to learn the ending  features: - Time: Indicative (Present, Compound past, Imperfect, More-than-perfect, Simple past, Previous past, Simple future, Future future), Conditional (Present, Past), Subjunctive (Present, Past, Imperfect, More-than-perfect), Imperfect (Present, Past), Infinitive (Present, Past), Participate (Present, Past), Gerund (Present, Past).  The French conjugation application has a simple graphical interface is minimal French Conjugation without internet.  Liste de conjugaison de la majorit des verbes franais. Conjugaison Franaise offline 12000 Verbes  lapplication de la Conjugaison franaise vous permet de conjuguer tous les verbes franais facilement sans connexion Internet. Conjugaison franaise 12000 Verbes Conjugaison franaise vous permet dapprendre la terminaison  Fonctionnalits: - Temps: Indicatif (Prsent, Pass compos, Imparfait, Plus-que-parfait, Pass simple, Pass antrieur, Futur simple, Futur antrieur), Conditionnel (Prsent, Pass), Subjonctif (Prsent, Pass, Imparfait, Plus-que-parfait), Imparfait (Prsent, Pass), Infinitif (Prsent, Pass), Participe (Prsent, Pass), Grondif (Prsent, Pass).  Lapplication de Conjugaison franaise a un interface graphique simple est minimale Conjugaison Franaise sans internet.
